short_summary: IT Bid, Phase 4 Construction of various buildings within the Houses of Parliament
description: These works will prepare various IT and security-related required spaces and functions for the House of Commons. This is a Request for Proposal only for Holders of Supply Arrangement EP938-232165.
full_summary:
# DCRM Phase 4 ITT

## Overview
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) procures construction services for various IT and security-related required spaces and functions for the House of Commons. This solicitation is for qualified suppliers who have already registered under Supply Arrangement EP938-232165.

## Solicitation Details
*   Solicitation Number: WS4518117594
*   Amendment Number: 6
*   Publication Date: 2024-04-23
*   Tender Closing Date: 2024-06-10T14:00:00
*   Amendment Date: 2024-06-05
*   Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-05-10
*   Expected Contract End Date: 2024-08-31
*   Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Trade Agreements: Many (see below)

## Defined UNSPSC Codes:
*   72000000 - Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services
*   72120000 - Nonresidential Building Construction Services

## Scope of Work:
The scope of this project is to prepare various IT and security-related required spaces and functions for the House of Commons.

## Notice Type:
The procurement category is Competitive (Selective Tendering).

## Selection Criteria:
The lowest bid will determine the selected supplier.

## Access to Solicitation:
Access the full solicitation documents on the [CanadaBuys](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/) website.

## Trade Agreements:

*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA) et plus autres agents

 How to Register as a Supplier:

If you want to bid on this project but are not a registered supplier on the CanadaBuys platform, you can register at the following link: [TIGG](https://regionalcert.gbc.ca/web_register/GbCigitbMaxfiB__)

Note. I did a major oversight on this one, this link in the sollicitation description is not available anymore. You would have to contact the public tender entity and find the appropriate link with the new website. Sorry for the confusion.
Contact Information:
For more information, please contact:

Robert Angell, Procurement Specialist
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier Street, Phase III, Place du
